contextId.occurrenceNote: This has a quotation within a quotation. It can be stated as an indirect quotation. Alternate translation: "He will say that I am his Father, his God, and the rock of his salvation." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotesinquotes]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotations]])
contextId.glQuote: He will call out to me, 'You are my Father, my God, and the rock of my salvation.'
